org.opends.sdk
Class AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.SynchronousConnection
      org.opends.sdk.AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Connection
Enclosing class:
AuthenticatedConnectionFactory
public static final class AuthenticatedConnectionFactory.AuthenticatedConnection
extends SynchronousConnection

An authenticated synchronous connection supports all operations except Bind operations.

Method Summary
 BindResult bind(BindRequest request)
          Bind operations are not supported by pre-authenticated connections.
 BindResult bind(String name, String password)
          Bind operations are not supported by pre-authenticated connections.
 BindResult getAuthenticatedBindResult()
          Returns an unmodifiable view of the Bind result which was returned from the server after authentication.

          Re-authenticates to the Directory Server using the bind request associated with this connection.

Method Detail

bind

public BindResult bind(BindRequest request)
                throws UnsupportedOperationException
Bind operations are not supported by pre-authenticated connections. This method will always throw UnsupportedOperationException.

Specified by:
bind in interface Connection
Overrides:
bind in class SynchronousConnection
Parameters:
request - The bind request.
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this connection does not support bind operations.

bind

public BindResult bind(String name,
                       String password)
                throws UnsupportedOperationException
Bind operations are not supported by pre-authenticated connections. This method will always throw UnsupportedOperationException.

Specified by:
bind in interface Connection
Overrides:
bind in class SynchronousConnection
Parameters:
name - The distinguished name of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as, which may be empty.
password - The password of the Directory object that the client wishes to bind as, which may be empty.
Returns:
The result of the operation.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - If this connection does not support bind operations.

rebind

public BindResult rebind()
                  throws ErrorResultException,
                         UnsupportedOperationException,
                         IllegalStateException
Re-authenticates to the Directory Server using the bind request associated with this connection. If re-authentication fails for some reason then this connection will be automatically closed.

Returns:
The result of the operation.
Throws:
ErrorResultException - If the result code indicates that the request failed for some reason.
UnsupportedOperationException - If this connection does not support rebind operations.
IllegalStateException - If this connection has already been closed, i.e. if isClosed() == true.

getAuthenticatedBindResult

public BindResult getAuthenticatedBindResult()
Returns an unmodifiable view of the Bind result which was returned from the server after authentication.

Returns:
The Bind result which was returned from the server after authentication.
